changeSet.sql: CREATE TABLE `inventory` ( `id` bigint NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `deleted` bit(1) NOT NULL DEFAULT b'0', `name` varchar(250) CHARACTER SET utf8 COLLATE utf8_general_ci NOT NULL, `folder_id` bigint NOT NULL, `unit_id` bigint NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`id`), UNIQUE KEY `IDX_inventory_name` (`name`) USING BTREE, KEY `IDX_inventory_deleted` (`deleted`), KEY `IDX_inventory_folder_id` (`folder_id`), KEY `IDX_inventory_unit` (`unit_id`), CONSTRAINT `folder` FOREIGN KEY (`folder_id`) REFERENCES `inventory_folder` (`id`), CONSTRAINT `unit` FOREIGN KEY (`unit_id`) REFERENCES `units` (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8mb3 COMMENT='Справочник Инвентаря'
